ch.hevs.isi

Class SmartControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • ch.hevs.isi.SmartControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SmartControl
extends java.util.TimerTask
    This class is responsible for managing the Minecraft world. It also sets uo the database and web connectors. Its purpose is to read the values of the datapoints in the minecraft world and take decision and write back values to the minecraft world. It is "smart", as it takes decision based on the values of the datapoints.

      This function simply the world and sets up everything : It instantiates a database connector, a field connector and a web connector It also initializes all the datapoints of the minecraft world to be used later.

      • startPolling

        public static void startPolling(int time)
        This function sets up a timer (i.er. Thread) that will instantiate a SmartControl object every x time
        Parameters:
        time - : time between each call of the function

      • startWorld

        public static void startWorld(java.lang.String dbProtocol,
                              java.lang.String dbHostName,
                              java.lang.String dbOrg,
                              java.lang.String dbBucket,
                              java.lang.String dbToken,
                              java.lang.String modbusTcpHost,
                              int modbusTcpPort,
                              java.lang.String dbName)
        This function simply the world and sets up everything : It instantiates a database connector, a field connector and a web connector It also initializes all the datapoints of the minecraft world to be used later. It also sets up the starting values for the factory the coal factory, the solar panels and the wind turbines It takes the following arguments
        Parameters:
        dbProtocol - : The protocol of connection to the database (http or https)
        dbHostName - : the hoatname of the database (e.g. eu-central-1-1.aws.cloud2.influxdata.com)
        dbOrg - : the organization of the database (e.g. SIn14)
        dbBucket - : the bucket of the database (e.g. SIn14)
        dbToken - : The Token to acccess the database
        modbusTcpHost - : the hostname of the modbus server (e.g. localhost)
        modbusTcpPort: - the port of the modbus server (e.g. 1502)
        dbName - : The name of the database (e.g. Minecraft)
